text:
@GavinNewsom Evidence that the virus already spread far before its discovery this year now came out.

It may have spread around the world from March 2019 or even earlier.

The effect of these lockdown and mask orders are questionable, and motive highly suspicious.
https://t.co/g1g2ua0Ayv
